description: Fasttracker 2, or Fasttracker II, is an audio tracker designed for creating music. You can arrange patterns (stored in XP files) along a master timeline to create a sequence that makes up a song.
Titon Productions is a Swedish start-up that developed and released Fasttracker 2 in November 1994. The company developed the software through version 2.08, releasing it in August 1997.
